item.description: Missy Cohen-Fyffe, founder and president of Babe Ease, LLC www.cleanshopper.com, a home based business founded in 1999 in New Hampshire that is focused on innovative baby products such as the Clean Shopper shopping cart cover and the Clean Diner highchair cover. Missy holds 20 patents and trademarks. She has been a guest on many syndicated TV shows and featured in national publications.
item.name: Inventors Association of New England April Meetup
